docs.title: Unified AI Transparency Benchmarks
docs.snippet: A cross-border working group endorsed a baseline suite of transparency metrics including bias tracking and incident disclosure.

docs.title: GPU Fleet Expansions Announced
docs.snippet: Cloud providers scale out data-center GPUs to serve increasing multimodal inference workloads across industries.

docs.title: Healthcare AI Oversight Ramps Up
docs.snippet: Providers introduce layered oversight for triage tools, combining alerts with clinician validation and post-deployment audits.

docs.title: Retail Content Agents in Limited Release
docs.snippet: Retailers test agent frameworks to localise creative assets, measuring lift while enforcing brand guardrails and approvals.

docs.title: Finance Firms Publish Model Cards
docs.snippet: Several institutions made model card templates public to speed internal review cycles and satisfy audit readiness requirements.

docs.title: EU Registry Concept Gains Traction
docs.snippet: The proposed EU registry for high-impact AI would centralise evaluation summaries and remediation timelines for rapid supervisory review.
